data.text: In fact, I wish it turned them into ANMCs from Parasite Eve II for their blind following. I’m not against vaccines, but I don’t get the flu shot. Haven’t for 10 years, and I won’t get this because I’m not a test subject. I keep everything else up to date.

I unfortunately sub to a subreddit for my next job that has been delayed until Japan opens back up, and these idiots on there are overwhelming. Forcing vaccinations will NEVER happen. Fuck you bitches trying to impose things for a country you don’t even belong to.
